author: Johnny
date_of_review: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2019
review_content: Expensive, but worth it. Paying for all the locations seemed crazy to me but it's much cheaper than buying them individually and there is literally so much to do. My kids (2 and 5) have spent HOURS on this game exploring and creating new characters. There's a ton of secrets and my older daughter gets an absolute kick out of finding new ones. We've had this for quite a while and it hasn't seemed to get old yet. They update or add more locations pretty frequently and the post office gives a new gift (free) weekly. It really seems to me the developers really love this world as much as the people they create it for. The details are adorable and I find myself sucked into it when I'm playing with the kids. Really awesome game.
title: This is my kids most used app!
